channel.title: Monsters
channel.description: How do you make monsters hit you back and actually hit now (o)s

item.title: Monsters
item.dc:creator: @suikodenscape suikodenscape
item.description:
@suikodenscape wrote:

Umm go into npc.cfg i beleive and add it where the numbers align like if it is 1256 ot something find the 1250+ and add it where it needs to go. just coppy other ones to add. Adn i’ve been searching for a while to make em not hit 0’s so if you find out anything let me know.

Ex.
NpcID NpcName combat health
npc = 2693 Seagull 2 7
npc = 2694 Seagull 3 10
npc = 2697 Corporal_Beast 982 250

Read full topic
